newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: VNU, FREEPAGES SET JOINT VENTURE.
newsitem.headline: VNU, FREEPAGES SET JOINT VENTURE.

text.p: NV Verenigd Bezit VNU said on Wednesday it had agreed to set up a joint venture in the Netherlands with Britain's Freepages Group Plc.
The Dutch publisher said Freepages already operated a national toll-free classified telephone directory for consumers which was easily accessed by telephone via the Internet.

It said the two companies had agreed to set up a joint venture to introduce the same concept in the Netherlands and would jointly invest some 40 million guilders in the project over the next three years.
VNU said the joint venture would enable it to build up a strong position in interactive information services.
In time it would become a valuable addition to VNU's existing marketing information services, it added.
